attributes.action: Require schools and colleges to provide gender neutral toilets
attributes.additional_details: Now, more than ever, trans and non binary children, all across the UK struggle to use the gender assigned toilets in school, partly because of bullying. Many children struggling with their gender identity would feel a lot more comfortable and confident using a gender neutral toilet. Children shouldn't have to be scared or worried about using a toilet, there's a lot more things to worry about, especially in school. It would greatly improve trans and non binary children & teens way of life in school.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to consider requiring schools and colleges to put in place gender neutral toilets.
